posts.post_content:
All, I have a PSA 4 Burch Fielding EPDG available for sale. 

Will consider a comparable trade for another EPDG I am needing.  Let me know what you have.

Otherwise, asking $130 shipped and will listen to offers. Anyone saying I'll take it gets priority.  Paypal Friends or Money Order please.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=281721&d=1500997340[/IMG]
